title: Config is wiped when importing multiple *.RDG files
author: Fantomovich
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->
File confCons.xml is wiped If I import *.RDG files (from RDCMan v2.7 build 1406.0). Also as many "confCons.xml.<DATE-TIME>.backup" files are wiped, as I imported RDG files (some were with saved credentials).
Domain field in some imported connections cotains "Object reference not set to an instance of an object." and cannot be changed.
Application cannot be started because of zero-sized confCons.xml file.

comments.author: Gswaffy
comments.snippet:
I have also had the same problem, creating an export before closing also results in a 0 byte export file.

Watching the settings within %appdata% I can see the first two imported .rdg are ok, but the third results in a 0byte confCons.xml file.

Have tried with both 1.76.11 and 1.76.14

comments.author: sparerd
